channel.title: Rob Merrifield
channel.description: Recent news about Rob Merrifield, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Edson Leader
item.description:
Portuguese and Peruvian ambassadors tour region
Yellowhead MP Rob Merrifield, fourth from left, spent June 25 showing off the industry in the area to the Portuguese Ambassador Jose Moreira du Cunha and the Ambassador of Peru Jose Antonio Bellina. This picture was taken at the Edson Weyerhaeuser ...

item.title: Mentioned by Whitecourt Star
item.description:
Yellowhead gets visit from Ambassadors
Yellowhead MP Rob Merrifield and town and county councilors welcomed Ambassador of Peru Jose Antonio Bellina and the Ambassador of Portugal Jose Moreira da Cunha during a lunch at the Eagle River Casino on Monday, June 24. The ambassadors ...

item.title: Mentioned by Alberta Oil Magazine
item.description:
Stephen Harper's top Keystone XL lobbyist talks politics
Rob Merrifield is not a household name in Canadian politics. But the MP for the northern Alberta riding of Yellowhead has become an important figure to the oil and gas industry. Merrifield is one of Prime Minister Stephen Harper's point men in Washington, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Mayerthorpe Freelancer
item.description:
Mayerthorpe kept in Yellowhead riding
The Alberta Federal Electoral Boundary Commission, despite objections from northern MPs including Yellowhead MP Rob Merrifield, opted to make Whitecourt part of the new Peace River-Westlock riding. Merrifield was not impressed, especially with the ...
